content: add after-dark energy to your home or garden with the radiant stripes cushion **download the free pattern in dutch english uk and us here 1 ** picture a cosy garden nook lit by string lights the soft glow of lanterns and your radiant stripes cushion casting its own luminous green light as the evening settles in whether indoors or out this bold and brilliantly fun crochet project brings colour contrast and a spark of playfulness to any space long after the sun has gone down crocheted using the scheepjes glow up colour pack and contrasting white catona each of the 16 striped squares 8 each of square 1 and square 2 colourways features row of alternating yarns for a vibrant daytime effect but once darkness falls the glow up yarn reveals a striking green glow especially vivid when charged under led lighting arranged to form a clever basket weave effect the finished cushion adds a unique and unexpected twist to your handmade décor measuring 48 x 48cm 19 x 19in the cushion front is simply stitched to a ready-made cushion cover no need to crochet a backing whether you re adding a glow to garden gatherings creating a feature piece for your craft corner or exploring the magic of glow-in-the-dark yarns the radiant stripes cushion offers a playful way to let your creativity shine available to download in both english uk terms with us conversions included and dutch the free full written pattern includes a table for square 1 and square 2 colourways full-colour crochet charts for the squares and for joining a schematic showing the layout and placement of all squares
